sentences.cn: …与海军区域防卫有关的问题。

sentences.en: But why should they not so pertain?
sentences.cn: 但是,为什么它们不属于我 呢 ?

sentences.en: His remark did not pertain to the question.
sentences.cn: 他的话同这个问题不相干.

sentences.en: How does working as a lifeguard pertain to salesmanship?
sentences.cn: 当过救生员和销售有什么相干 呢 ?

sentences.en: How this might pertain to choices that people might make is, as yet, unclear.
sentences.cn: 这种方式如何与人类的决策过程相联系我们还不甚清晰.

sentences.en: I'm afraid that your remark does not pertain to the question.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你的话与这一问题不相干.

sentences.en: In the case of depression, a similar explanation may pertain.
sentences.cn: 忧郁症也许可以用类似的方法解释.

sentences.en: It does not pertain to the young to instruct their elders.
sentences.cn: 年轻人不应该对老年人发号施令.

sentences.en: It does not pertain to you to instruct him.
Other events, such as onheight and onopacity, pertain to views'visible attributes.
sentences.cn: 另外一些事件, 比如onheight 、 onwidth,当view对象 的可视部分发生变化时产生.

sentences.en: Post any links promoting other affiliate programs or that do not pertain to the discussion.
sentences.cn: 不可以发表任何联系,促进其他附属内容或不相关的讨论.

sentences.en: The file contain all the document that pertain to the new project.
sentences.cn: 这份档案包括所有关于新工程的文件.

sentences.en: The following details pertain primarily to the critical - depth flume.
sentences.cn: 下面的详细说明主要是针对临界深度型水槽的.

sentences.en: These nouns all pertain to what underlies and supports.
sentences.cn: 这些名词都与基础与支撑物有关.

sentences.en: We shall present certain introductory notions that pertain to finite deformation in this chapter.
sentences.cn: 在这一章里,这们将初步地介绍一些关于有限变形的概念.

trans.tran_en: If one thing pertains to another, it relates, belongs, or applies to it

trans.tran_cn: 关于，有关，适合，附属，从属
